description: Replacement of stained glass panes to stairwell window and fanlight on rear elevation external door
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: 100 (Location and site plan); 020 (Ground and first floor demolition plans); 021 (Loft and roof demolition plan); 030 (Existing front and rear elevations); 031 (Existing side elevations); 120 (Proposed ground and first floor plan); 121 (Proposed loft and roof plan); 130 (Proposed front and rear elevations); 131 (Proposed side elevations); 132 Rev. 02 (Existing stained glass window and door fan); 133 Rev. 01 (Proposed stained glass window and door fan); Design, Access and Heritage Statement
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.

| Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building on this site, while the proposed glazing shall match the exact specifications indicated on the approved plans.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), the Bedford Park Conservation Area Management Plan (2007), the Bedford Park Conservation Area Appraisal (2007), policy D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the roof of the building.

Reason: To protect residential amenity in accordance with policies 1.1, 1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
